title: T202 Hassan - Home Run Baker & Eddie Collins - Center Panel "The Athletic Infield"
author: D. Bergin

posts.post_title: T202 Hassan - Home Run Baker & Eddie Collins - Center Panel "The Athletic Infield"
posts.post_content:
T202 Hassan Center Panel

Cheap way to pick up a vintage and attractive T-Card of a couple Philadelphia Athletic HOF'ers

Includes:
[STRIKE]
#1. "A Great Batsman" - Napolean Lajoie at the plate[/STRIKE]

[STRIKE]#2. "Collins Easily Safe" - Awesome dual shot of both Eddie Collins and Nap Lajoie[/STRIKE]

#3. "The Athletic Infield" - Great group shot with Eddie Collins, Home Run Baker, Stuffy McInnes and Jack Barry

Condition as shown in the scans. If you need bigger scans, let me know and I'll e-mail them to you. Very presentable, clean looking card

The (2) Nap Lajoie's sold

[STRIKE]$50[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE] $35 (Shipped in the U.S.) for "The Athletic Infield"

Pay almost any way you like.

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.

[quote name="OhioCardCollector" post=2205576]Pm sent on the lot[/QUOTE]


Replied. Thanks. :)

Lot updated.
Price bump for the last card in the lot. Thanks.

Price bump.

$35 for "The Athletic Infield" with Eddie Collins, Home Run Baker ++
